title: MD
biography: John Gardner, known professionally as Akshay Anand is an Indian actor who appears mainly in Hindi films and television.
aiSummary: Akshay Anand is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 50 at PGIMERNeuroinflammation (Member). Has been published in Annals of Neurosciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
